body_html:
But isn't framework_headers_lib just a collection of headers? Right now I'm including also all the core tensorflow code for example from //tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite.

Here's my example build file, do you mean that I can replace all the deps with just framework_headers_lib?

cc_library(
    name = "myapp_android_tensorflow_lib",
    srcs = if_android(["@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:android_op_registrations_and_gradients"]),
    copts = tf_copts(),
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite",
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:protos_cc",
        "@org_tensorflow//third_party/eigen3",
        ":myapp_android_tensorflow_kernels",
    ],
    alwayslink = 1,
)

cc_library(
    name = "myapp_android_tensorflow_kernels",
    srcs = select({
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow:android": [
            ":android_myapp_ops",
            "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_core_ops",
            "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_extended_ops",
        ],
        "//conditions:default": [],
    }),
    copts = tf_copts(),
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite",
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:protos_cc",
        "@org_tensorflow//third_party/eigen3",
    ],
    alwayslink = 1,
)

body:
But isn't `framework_headers_lib` just a collection of headers? Right now I'm including also all the core tensorflow code for example from `//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite`.

Here's my example build file, do you mean that I can replace all the deps with just `framework_headers_lib`?

```
cc_library(
    name = "myapp_android_tensorflow_lib",
    srcs = if_android(["@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:android_op_registrations_and_gradients"]),
    copts = tf_copts(),
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite",
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:protos_cc",
        "@org_tensorflow//third_party/eigen3",
        ":myapp_android_tensorflow_kernels",
    ],
    alwayslink = 1,
)

cc_library(
    name = "myapp_android_tensorflow_kernels",
    srcs = select({
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow:android": [
            ":android_myapp_ops",
            "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_core_ops",
            "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_extended_ops",
        ],
        "//conditions:default": [],
    }),
    copts = tf_copts(),
    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
    deps = [
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite",
        "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/core:protos_cc",
        "@org_tensorflow//third_party/eigen3",
    ],
    alwayslink = 1,
)
```
